titleStmt.title: A conference betwixt a modern atheist, and his friend. By the methodizer of the Second spira.
titleStmt.author: Sault, Richard, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Sault by Wing.
Reproductions of originals in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York (1410:20) and the University of Totonto Library (2915:11b).

Item at reel 2915:11b with: The second spira: being a fearful example of an atheist, who had apostatized from the Christian religion, and died in despair at Westminster, Decemb. 8. 1692 ... / By J.S. ... The fifth ed. London, : Printed for John Dunton ..., 1693.
